ValidationRule.description: If the number of entered digits is less than 8 and contains illegal characters, validation rule should display an error message.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DDMandateComplete__c = true,NOT(ISNULL(bankAccountNumber__c)) && OR( LEN( bankAccountNumber__c ) <> 8, NOT(REGEX( bankAccountNumber__c ,"^[0-9]+$"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bank account number doesn't allow illegal characters and digits less than 8. Account Numbers in the UK must be exactly 8 digits.
